questions: Q. 1. Who manufactured the new model of the steam engine in 1781 ?
Q. 2. What does Industrial revolution refer to ?
Q. 3. When did the earliest factories come up in England ?
Q. 4. Who improved the steam engine produced by Newcomen ?
Q. 5. Who produced a popular music book that had a picture on the cover page announcing the Dawn of the Century ?
Q. 6. How was the Nationalists message of Swadeshi spread ?
Q. 7. What is proto-industrialization ? (NCERT)  1 mark each
answers: Ans. It was a possible phase in the development of modern industrial economics that preceded and created conditions for the establishment of fully industrial societies. 1

questions: Q. 8. Name the first country to undergo industrial revolution.
Q. 9. Which mechanical device was used for weaving with ropes and pullies, which helped to weave wide pieces of cloth ?
Q. 10. Which ports had trade links with South Asian ports ?
Q. 11. Which Indian port lost its importance during colonial rule ? Why ? (NCERT)
answers: Ans. Surat. The European companies gradually gained power by securing a variety of concessions from local counts and acquiring the monopoly rights of trade. 1  3 marks each
